attributes.action: President Donald Trump should be banned from entering the UK.
attributes.additional_details: The UK government needs to send a clear message that it does not support this policy. It's time the UK sends a clear message to 'The Donald' and the US  that we will no longer be their poodle.
attributes.background: President Donald Trump should be banned from visiting the UK until he removes the order preventing travellers and refugees from seven Muslim countries gaining entry into the US. This is devisive and, more importantly, counter productive in combating terrorism.
